attributes.action: Make the PM answer questions put to him at Prime Minister's Questions.
attributes.additional_details: The PMQs session on 4 May, available via iPlayer, was one of the worst examples of David Cameron's flagrant disregard of the questions put to him by, for example, Jeremy Corbyn MP and Caroline Lucas MP.
attributes.background: The Speaker of the House of Commons is too lenient in allowing the Prime Minister to evade answering important questions put to him by the Leader of HM Opposition and other MPs. Surely this is an abuse of our democratic system. It is certainly horrible to listen to or watch on TV every week.
